name: Unicode

values.name: text'
values.comment:
Unescapes a string and then invokes `Html.text` on the result.

    Html.text "© © ©"  -- renders © © © to the page
    text'     "© © ©"  -- renders © © ©

values.name: unEsc
values.comment:
Unescapes all valid HTML escape sequences within a string.

    unEsc "© © © © © &cpy;" == "© © © © © &cpy;"
